attributes.action: Give every A Level student and University Student in the UK A Free Bus and Train Pass
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Current charge for a county run school bus is over £400 per academic year, and costs for trains is even more! These are impossible for students and parents to afford and would also encourage more students to further their education, taking more people off the streets and reducing the number of people requiring benefits

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
